member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.AllowExternalMembers
member.summary: Are external members allowed to join the group.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.AllowGoogleCommunication
member.summary: Is google allowed to contact admins.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.AllowWebPosting
member.summary: If posting from web is allowed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.ArchiveOnly
member.summary: If the group is archive only

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.CustomReplyTo
member.summary: Default email to which reply to any message should go.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.IncludeInGlobalAddressList
member.summary: If this groups should be included in global address list or not.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.IsArchived
member.summary: If the contents of the group are archived.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.MembersCanPostAsTheGroup
member.summary: Can members post using the group email address.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.MessageDisplayFont
member.summary: Default message display font. Possible values are: DEFAULT_FONT FIXED_WIDTH_FONT

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.MessageModerationLevel
member.summary: Moderation level for messages. Possible values are: MODERATE_ALL_MESSAGES MODERATE_NON_MEMBERS MODERATE_NEW_MEMBERS MODERATE_NONE

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.ReplyTo
member.summary: Whome should the default reply to a message go to. Possible values are: REPLY_TO_CUSTOM REPLY_TO_SENDER REPLY_TO_LIST REPLY_TO_OWNER REPLY_TO_IGNORE REPLY_TO_MANAGERS

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.SendMessageDenyNotification
member.summary: Should the member be notified if his message is denied by owner.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.ShowInGroupDirectory
member.summary: Is the group listed in groups directory

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.SpamModerationLevel
member.summary: Moderation level for messages detected as spam. Possible values are: ALLOW MODERATE SILENTLY_MODERATE REJECT

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.WhoCanInvite
member.summary: Permissions to invite members. Possbile values are: ALL_MEMBERS_CAN_INVITE ALL_MANAGERS_CAN_INVITE

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.WhoCanJoin
member.summary: Permissions to join the group. Possible values are: ANYONE_CAN_JOIN ALL_IN_DOMAIN_CAN_JOIN INVITED_CAN_JOIN CAN_REQUEST_TO_JOIN

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.WhoCanPostMessage
member.summary: Permissions to post messages to the group. Possible values are: NONE_CAN_POST ALL_MANAGERS_CAN_POST ALL_MEMBERS_CAN_POST ALL_IN_DOMAIN_CAN_POST ANYONE_CAN_POST

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.WhoCanViewGroup
member.summary: Permissions to view group. Possbile values are: ANYONE_CAN_VIEW ALL_IN_DOMAIN_CAN_VIEW ALL_MEMBERS_CAN_VIEW ALL_MANAGERS_CAN_VIEW

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Groupssettings.v1.Data.Groups.WhoCanViewMembership
member.summary: Permissions to view membership. Possbile values are: ALL_IN_DOMAIN_CAN_VIEW ALL_MEMBERS_CAN_VIEW ALL_MANAGERS_CAN_VIEW
